app.name: Dust
app.short_description: Use your Dust assistants directly from Zendesk
app.long_description: Use your Dust assistants directly from Zendesk with the full context of the current ticket you are working on, and facilitate the work of your support agents by building automatically perfect ticket resolution answers based on previous tickets and your knowledge base. Your users will need a Dust account for this app to work on their Zendesk account.
app.installation_instructions: Click install, an provide your workspace ID and API Key.
